data.title: Prague Rugby Sevens
data.meta_description: On behalf of Organizing Committee we would like to invite your team for the 6th year of our prestige PRAGUE RUGBY 7s tournament which will be held in Prague –
data.text:
Welcome to 6th PRAGUE RUGBY 7s 2024

June 22. – 23. 2024

On behalf of Organizing Committee we would like to invite your team for the 6th year of our prestige PRAGUE RUGBY 7s tournament which will be held in Prague – one of the most beautiful towns in Europe.

Thanks to our sponzors great prizes are awarded to the best 3 teams in mens category and for the winner in womens category!

PRAGUE RUGBY 7s is organised by and will be played on RC TATRA SMICHOV (in Prague) pitch. PRAGUE RUGBY 7s 2024 is planned as 2 days tournament (June 22 + June 23, 2024) for 12-16 MEN teams and 6-8 WOMEN teams!

Age limit: 18+

Younger players upon request

Programme

Friday, June 21, 2024

Welcome party on boat.

Saturday, June 22, 2024

Match day No. 1

Sunday, June 23, 2024

Match day No. 2 + Awards ceremony + After Party

Thursday or Monday:

optional day for friendly matches or

sightseeings of Prague, trips, excursions…

PRIZE MONEY

MEN CATEGORY

1. 3 000 €

2. 2 000 €

3. 1 000 €

WOMEN CATEGORY

1. 1 000 €

REGISTRATION FEE PER TEAM

550 € men/women

PARTICIPATING TEAMS / SOME PREVIOUS

PARTICIPATION PACKAGE PER PERSON INCLUDES

Accommodation for 3 nights with breakfast

Lunches on pitch on match days

Fruits and snacks on the pitch on match days

Free entry to the Welcome party on the boat

Entrance to After party

Free Entry to Goldfingers and Cross club

Festival souvenir for each person

REGISTRATION FEE INCLUDE

5 matches guaranted

Qualified referees

Each team will have own team tent

Match ball, water

Paramedic assistance during match days

Hostess/steward for each team

Online stream of the whole tournament

Grass pitches, changing rooms & showers, “cool down” zone

Managers meeting on Friday for 1 team representative

PARTICIPATION PACKAGES – HOTELS

WE ONLY ACCEPT TEAMS USING OUR PACKAGES!

SPECIAL TAILORMADE. LESS or MORE NIGHTS PACKAGES UPON REQUEST!

PARTICIPATION PACKAGE FOR 3 NIGHTS – PRICES PER PERSON IN DIFFERENT HOTELS

PRICE INCLUDES ACCOMMODATION FOR 3 NIGHTS WITH BREAKFAST in the HOTEL, LUNCHES on PITCH on MATCH DAYS, FRUITS and SNACKS on the pitch on match days.

FREE ENTRY to the Welcome party on the boat, Entrance to After party, Free Entry to Goldfingers and Cross club and Festival souvenir.

Limited number of single rooms per group. Exact rooming will be confirmed according to the exact availibity of rooms.

ADDITIONAL NIGHTS AVAILABLE ON REQUEST.

OTHER HOTELS or HOSTELS ACCORDING TO YOUR NEEDS ON REQUEST.

DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF ALL HOTELS ON REQUEST.

SHORT DESCRIPTION OF OFFERED HOTELS

HOTEL KRYSTAL ***

Hotel located not far from RC Tatra Smichov. Hotel is right on the metro stop and by metro you are in about 15-20 minutes in the centre of Prague.

HOTEL PRAGUE SUPERIOR ***

Hotel in the walking distance from the city centre.

HOTEL AMBIANCE ****

Hotel in the walking distance from the city centre.

HOTEL PYRAMIDA ****

Hotel with swimming pool and other services not far from RC Tatra Smichov. Also 15 minutes walk from Prague Castle area. By tram you are in about 15 minutes in the centre of Prague.

HOTEL ADLER ****

Hotel in the top city centre of Prague.

HOTEL METROPOLITAN OLD TOWN ****

Hotel in the top city centre of Prague.

HOTEL AMBASSADOR *****

Hotel in the top city centre of Prague.

LIABILITIES

All participants must respect rules and regulations of the Event for the games as well as healthy conditions, laws and regulations valid in Prague and the Czech Republic. Every team and individual undertakes to be sufficiently insured for injury, damages, loss, etc., and any other eventuality resulting from their participation in the Event or from their stay in the Czech Republic, either during the games or at any other event organized whether part of the Event Package or an optional programme. Organizing Committee and any persons involved in the organization of the Event will not be liable for any injuries, illness, loss, theft, damages or other arising from their participation in the Event or during their stay in the Czech Republic. All participants fully agree with these Terms of Conditions and oblige to respect and keep them.

PROCESS OF REGISTRATION

Only teams who would fill in and send Entry Form to the Official Event´s Address

(prague7s@estec.cz) and further follow the necessary instructions may become

participants of the Event. Entry forms will be sent on request.

Registration shall be completed only after the REGISTRATION FEE PER TEAM has

been fully paid.

Teams are accepted on the „first come-first served“ basis.

List of players must be filled and send to the official e-mail at least one week before the match day and original of the list of players must be present upon arrival to the rugby pitch

DEADLINE FOR APPLICATIONS OF TEAMS APRIL 08, 2024 (THE NUMBER OF TEAMS IS LIMITED).

DEADLINE FOR DEPOSIT PAYMENT OF 550 € per team is APRIL 15, 2024.

Deadline for paying full payment is: JUNE 03, 2024!
